info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:57AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, eastern Huerfano, southwestern Crowley and eastern Pueblo Counties through 130 AM MDT... At 1256 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Fowler to 6 miles south of Boone to 10 miles south of Blende. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fowler, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Boone, Salt Creek, Blende, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
